document.full_text: al qaeda operatives are in brazil planning attacks, raising money and recruiting followers, a leading news magazine reported saturday, renewing concerns about the nation serving as a hide-out for islamic militants.
document.title: al qaeda members hide in brazil, raise money: report
lines_and_colors: al qaeda operatives are in brazil planning attacks, raising money and recruiting followers, a leading news magazine reported saturday, renewing concerns about the nation serving as a hide-out for islamic militants.
